        public java.lang.String[] getHistory()
        Get history creates a log of all user transactions (including login/log-outs) to iterate over.
        Returns:
        All entries in the user transactions file

      • recordLogin

        public void recordLogin(boolean login)
        Function is called when user logs in or out, as a means to log the operations in the transaction log. If a login occurs, interest is also granted via depositInterest().
        Parameters:
        login - Boolean to log whether operation is a login or logout operation

      • rewriteFunds

        public void rewriteFunds(double amount,
                         User.TransactionType type,
                         java.lang.String user)
        Rewrite funds is used to update user transaction files on any monetary operation, adding entries to the log. Function checks transaction type to determine necessary action string to input, then rewrites all lines as necessary. If a transfer operation occurs, trivial recursion is used to call the function again with the correct transfer user.
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount of funds to add/subtract
        type - Transaction type (Deposit, Withdraw, Interest, Transfer, Receive)
        user - Username of currently affected user, for user file (relevant in transfer operations)

      • depositFunds

        public void depositFunds(double deposit)
        Used to update user funds with new deposit amount, and rewrite transaction file
        Parameters:
        deposit - Amount to add to account

      • depositInterest

        public void depositInterest()
        Function called on login, used to update user account balance on login with interest rate. Checks history by indexing backwards through ArrayList from getHistory() to find last log-in and logout. Uses compound interest formula (P(e)^rt) by finding the time difference between the two, and using user's interest rate (6% for normal user, 12% for premium), then updates funds

      • withdrawFunds

        public double withdrawFunds(double withdraw)
        Withdraws an amount of funds from the user's current amount balance, funds
        Parameters:
        withdraw - Amount of funds to withdraw
        Returns:
        Withdrawn amount

      • transferFunds

        public void transferFunds(double transfer,
                          java.lang.String user)
        Transfer funds is used to send funds between two users. Checks to make sure recipient exists, otherwise will exit the transaction!
        Parameters:
        transfer - Amount to funds to be transferred; can be greater than current account balance
        user - Username of user to transfer funds

      • getFunds

        public double getFunds()
        Returns:
        User account balance

        Parameters:
        _funds - Funds to set

      • sendMessage

        public static void sendMessage(java.lang.String subject,
                               java.lang.String sender,
                               java.lang.String recipient,
                               java.lang.String body)
        Method used to send messages between users
        Parameters:
        subject - Subject of the message sent
        sender - Username of the sending user; by default is set to current logged-in user, but can be used for system messages
        recipient - Username of recipient
        body - Message content
